title: GroupManager放置TNT和岩浆的权限是什么？
txt_content:
本帖最后由 1049480196 于 2013-1-23 22:28 编辑 

服主能放置TNT和岩浆，玩家却不能我用的是GM那个权限插件，问怎么加进去

加在哪里

groups:
  Owner:
    default: false
    permissions:
    - -vanish.*
    - '*'
    inheritance:
    - admin
    info:
      prefix: '&4大服主'
      build: true
      suffix: ''
  Player:
    default: true
    permissions:
    - -bukkit.command.kill
    - essentials.back
    - essentials.back.ondeath
    - essentials.getpos
    - essentials.home
    - essentials.sethome
    - essentials.suicide
    - essentials.tpa
    - essentials.tpaccept
    - essentials.tpahere
    - essentials.tpdeny
    - essentials.warp
    - essentials.warp.list
    - iConomy.help
    - iConomy.holdings
    - iConomy.payment
    - lockette.user.create.*
    - lwc.protect
    - logblock.lookup
    - mcmmo.ability.*
    - mcmmo.chat.partychat
    - mcmmo.defaults
    - mcmmo.skills.*
    - residence.create
    - sbc.cheats.reicave
    - sbc.cheats.smart-*
    - sbc.radar.reiradar
    - scs.create.buy
    - scs.create.sell
    - scs.use
    - worldedit.wand
    - xauth.register
    inheritance:
    - g:groupmanager_default
    - g:bukkit_default
    - g:essentials_default
    - g:towny_builder
    info:
      prefix: '&e平民'
      build: true
      suffix: ''
  Builder:
    default: false
    permissions:
    - scavenger.free
    - scs.create.display
    - worldedit.fixlava
    - worldedit.fixwater
    - worldedit.green
    - worldedit.region.faces
    - worldedit.region.walls
    - worldedit.selection.*
    - worldedit.snow
    - worldedit.tool.deltree
    - worldedit.tool.tree
    - worldedit.wand
    - worldedit.wand.toggle
    inheritance:
    - player
    - g:essentials_builder
    - g:towny_builder
    info:
      prefix: '&2建筑师'
      build: true
      suffix: ''
  Admin:
    default: false
    permissions:
    - iConomy.accounts.*
    - iConomy.holdings.others
    - lockette.admin.break
    - lockette.admin.bypass
    - lockette.admin.create.*
    - lockette.admin.snoop
    - lwc.mod
    - logblock.spawnTools
    - mcmmo.chat.*
    - mcmmo.defaultsop
    - mcmmo.item.*
    - mcmmo.tools.*
    - otherdrops.admin.*
    - scavenger.list
    - scavenger.reload
    - scs.admin
    - scs.create.exchange
    - scs.create.unlimited
    - scs.manage
    - scs.remove
    - xauth.admin.changepw
    - xauth.admin.location
    - xauth.admin.logout
    - xauth.admin.register
    - xauth.admin.unregister
    inheritance:
    - builder
    - g:groupmanager_admin
    - g:bukkit_admin
    - g:essentials_admin
    - g:towny_admin
    - g:vanish_admin
    info:
      prefix: '&c管理员'
      build: true
      suffix: ''

replies.txt_content:
大兴 发表于 2013-1-23 22:41 
不是加在groupmanager，是加在essentials里
怎么加？

replies.author: 大兴
replies.txt_content: 在essential的config文件里把禁止放岩浆TNT改成false就行了
